alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 6:45AM CST until January 12 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT: Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of a dusting up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE: Portions of western Arkansas. * WHEN: Until noon CST today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS: Snow and blowing snow could create hazardous travel conditions this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County
